schemas.py¶

class src.schemas.ContactModel(*, first_name: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=2), MaxLen(max_length=50)], last_name: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=2), MaxLen(max_length=50)], email: Annotated[EmailStr, MinLen(min_length=7), MaxLen(max_length=80)], phone_number: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=7), MaxLen(max_length=15)], birthday_date: date, info: str | None = None)[source]¶

Bases: BaseModel

Represents the base model for a contact.

first_name¶

The first name of the contact. Must be between 2 and 50 characters.

Type:

str

last_name¶

The last name of the contact. Must be between 2 and 50 characters.

Type:

str

email¶

The email address of the contact. Must be between 7 and 80 characters.

Type:

EmailStr

phone_number¶

The phone number of the contact. Must be between 7 and 15 characters.

Type:

str

birthday_date¶

The birth date of the contact.

Type:

date

info¶

Additional information about the contact. Default is None.

Type:

Optional[str]

birthday_date: date¶
email: EmailStr¶
first_name: str¶
info: str | None¶
last_name: str¶
model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {}¶

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

phone_number: str¶
class src.schemas.ContactResponse(*, first_name: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=2), MaxLen(max_length=50)], last_name: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=2), MaxLen(max_length=50)], email: Annotated[EmailStr, MinLen(min_length=7), MaxLen(max_length=80)], phone_number: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=7), MaxLen(max_length=15)], birthday_date: date, info: str | None = None, id: int, created_at: datetime, updated_at: datetime | None)[source]¶

Bases: ContactModel

Represents the response model for a contact, extending ContactModel.

id¶

The unique identifier of the contact.

Type:

int

created_at¶

The timestamp when the contact was created.

Type:

datetime

updated_at¶

The timestamp when the contact was last updated. Default is None.

Type:

Optional[datetime]

created_at: datetime¶
id: int¶
model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {'from_attributes': True}¶

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

updated_at: datetime | None¶
